Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.app.api.os.modules

Interface AdHocCommunicative

All Superinterfaces:
Locatable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ChargingStationOperatingSystem, ElectricVehicleOperatingSystem, RoadSideUnitOperatingSystem, TrafficLightOperatingSystem, VehicleOperatingSystem
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChargingStationUnit, ElectricVehicleUnit, RoadSideUnit, TrafficLightGroupUnit, VehicleUnit
public interface AdHocCommunicative extends Locatable
Interface to mark an OperatingSystem as an owner of a AdHocModule to enable ad-hoc communication, thus making it communicative via ITS-G5.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    AdHocModule
    getAdHocModule()
    Returns the ad-hoc communication module of this unit.
